subject: p16059470
Findings: Limited evaluation due to respiratory motion especially in the lower lungs. The previously seen right basilar patchy opacity appears improved. A granuloma is seen in the right upper lobe. The interstitial markings are slightly prominent due to patients known emphysematous changes of the lungs. The cardiomediastinal silhouette and hila are normal. An ICD device is seen. RUE PICC line ends in the distal SVC. There are no displaced rib fractures.
Impression: Limited, negative. PICC in appropriate position. Limited evaluation due to motion artifact, repeat CXR might be considered.
